title: Der Palast
overview: The focus of the German-German family history are the twin sisters Chris and Marlene, who met for the first time in their lives at the end of the 1980s. This fateful encounter between the two women not only conjures up their own dreams, wishes and hopes, but also the desire to enjoy life beyond all outer and inner walls. For the first time ever, Berlin's Friedrichstadt-Palast is the setting for a fictional series.
